name: OEMTOOLS 24507 Professional Series Ethylene Glycol Antifreeze Tester,Tests Freezing Point of Antifreeze and Proper Water/Coolant Mixture
short_description: Works With Your Engine Hot Or Cold: Disc-type tester is accurate at all temperatures; Tests your coolant’s freezing point and helps guard against coolant overprotection
Easy To Read: Count the number of floating disks in the coolant tester and compare it to the chart on the body of the tester; Five floating discs means ideal protection
Prevents Overprotection: Includes a special 6th disc which shows overprotection and a loss of coolant efficiency due to a bad water-coolant mix; Our coolant tester has you covered
Simple And Powerful: Features a clear body that makes it easy to check your coolant for impurities, such as rust; This coolant tester kit features a simple yet powerful design
Works On Any Vehicle: Test diesel antifreeze, RV antifreeze, camper antifreeze, marine antifreeze, just about any vehicle's antifreeze coolant with ease with our coolant tester
product_description: Our radiator coolant tester tests hot or cold ethylene glycol-based coolant, including Dex-Cool. This glycol test kit features easy-to-read discs that are magnified by the convex design of the clear thermal resistant plastic barrel. There are six discs. The first five discs show the freezing point of your antifreeze, and the six disc floats if your antifreeze and water levels are incorrect, resulting in overprotection. The ideal reading is five floating discs, which is a freeze indicator reading of -34F or -37C. You may not be scheduled for your next coolant flush anytime soon, but testing your antifreeze is an important way to ensure it is providing proper protection. The clear body of our coolant test makes it easy to examine your anti freeze for impurities, rust, and debris, which can indicate you need to move up your next engine coolant flush. Our coolant test kit is designed to be simple, easy to read, and super useful. If you're serious about protecting your engine, this simple yet powerful tool is a must-have addition to your toolbox.

short_description: Easy-to-read Dual Scale: Our car coolant tester reduces reading difficulty with its intuitive pointer design, featuring a dual scale with °F/°C scales on the face for quick access to winter freezing point (-43°C to -12°C) and summer boiling point data (125°C to 131°C)

Detecting Function: In the daily maintenance of the vehicle, the state of the coolant directly determines the safety of the engine, the use of our anti freeze tester automotive, can help you quickly detect the condition of the coolant, so that the engine is always in a stable state of running

Durable & Soft: Using PS as the main material of the coolant tester automotive, which is highly transparent and won't break easily, and using rubber as the main material of the ball, which is soft to the touch and has moderate elasticity, and fits the contour of your hand when you hold it

Portable Tools: Our antifreeze tester for coolant fully consider your carrying and storage needs, the overall size of only 8.34*2.83*1.88 inch, can easily fit into the daily use of the toolbox or car glove compartment, you can take it out and use it at any time

Use of The Antifreeze Coolant Tester: Simply follow the steps below to draw in coolant according to the position of the fill line - squeeze to drain air bubbles - keep the small pointer vertical - check where the large pointer is pointing to get a clear picture of the freezing point
product_description: DUAL SCALE CAR ANTIFREEZE TESTER, A NECESSARY TOOL FOR YOUR CAR Product Attributes Colors: Black + Transparent Sizes: Dial Size: 4.05*2.83 inch Rubber Tip Size: 2.28*1.88 inch Rubber Tube Length: 5.27 inch Weight: 3.75 oz Material: Rubber, PS Packaging: Car Antifreeze Tester*1 How to Use 1. Take out the car antifreeze tester and look carefully at the surface of the instrument, you can see a clear horizontal line marking, which is the standard inhalation scale of coolant. Suck in the coolant slowly through the hose/ball. Note that the standard line has to be met 2. After sucking the coolant, check whether there are air bubbles in the coolant, if there are, please squeeze and drain them out 3. Adjust the angle of the small pointer, which is critical for accurate readings, so that it is strictly perpendicular to the previously observed horizontal line 4. After completing the above steps, the °F or °C scale that the large pointer is pointing to is the current freezing point of the coolant Product Functions & Features 1. Our car coolant tester covers two scale units at the same time, so that car owners with different habits can read the data conveniently, and the pointer structure improves readability 2. Whether it's a regular toolbox or a grocery box in the car, you can find a suitable place to store our coolant tester automotive, making it a convenient inspection tool for you
